nodes.description: 2017年1月2日，萨德尔城东部什叶派穆斯林区及Kindi和Imam Ali医院附近发生至少3起自杀式汽车爆炸，造成56人死亡、120余人受伤
nodes.support_text: On January 2, 2017, at least three suicide car bombings took place in a Shia Muslim eastern district of Sadr City, as well as behind the Kindi and Imam Ali hospitals, killing 56 people and injuring more than 120 others.

nodes.description: 伊拉克总理哈迪尔·阿巴迪在新闻发布会上披露，市场爆炸系自杀式袭击者伪装招聘日工后引爆炸弹
nodes.support_text: Haider al-Abadi, Iraq's prime minister, had informed in a news conference that the suicide bombing, in Sadr City's busy market, was operated by the suicide bomber who detonated a vehicle with explosives. The bomber had pretended to hire day labourers in the market; once labourers gathered near the vehicle, the vehicle was detonated by him.

nodes.description: 法国总统弗朗索瓦·奥朗德在袭击发生时身处该市
nodes.support_text: French President François Hollande was in the city during the attacks.

nodes.description: 极端组织伊斯兰国宣称对针对什叶派群体的爆炸袭击负责
nodes.support_text: The jihadist group Islamic State claimed the responsibility of attacks, with a targeted attack on a 'gathering of Shia'.
